channel.title: 126 cmb

item.title: 126 cmb
item.dc:creator: @0uch_a_arr0w 0uch a arr0w
item.description:
@0uch_a_arr0w wrote:

public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}

What do I do to this for it to be 126Cmb instead of 185!?

Ty In Advance![br][size=1]Posted on: March 30, 2007, 10:08:56 PM[/size][hr]?

Read full topic
